posts.post: Gender-based violence is everybody’s business.There is hashtag#NoExcuse for inaction when you witness it.We want a world where women and girls can live free from fear.In every heartbeat.With every breath.At every step.Repost if you agree!hashtag#UN hashtag#nessunaScusa hashtag#stopviolence Valore D  UN Women hashtag#NoExcuse

Approaching the end of a very long but super energizing and exciting week!It all started on Tuesday at China International Import Exibition (CIIE) in Shanghai where I had the privilege to consolidate the partnership between Zambon and AstraZeneca in China.Wednesday with the Zambon Chine team in the office before leaving for Jakarta where I had a fantastic day on Thursday with the Zambon Indonesia Team! Last stop in Shanghai for an insightful strategic meeting with the Chinese Team!I want to thank all my teams for a great preparation and outstanding level of engagement and energy to deliver solutions and drugs to as many patients as possible!Andrea Mosconi Laura Serafin Gianluca Parola Giovanni R. Danilo LUCIBELLO Luigi Boaretto
Glad and honored to join Zambon.Looking forward to contribute improving patient’s life world wide!

Our warm welcome to Mirko Merletti, our new Chief Commercial Officer (CCO). Mirko has successfully covered important leadership positions during his 23-year international career, mainly in the pharmaceutical industry and we wish him all the best in our upcoming journey together.
